However , information pharmacokinetics dexmedetomidine intranasal administration . The aim study investigate comparative pharmacokinetics intranasally intravenously administer dexmedetomidine healthy volunteer . In addition , report effect intranasally intravenously administer dexmedetomidine plasma catecholamine level , systemic blood pressure , heart rate sedation . We also monitor local systemic safety tolerability intranasally administer dexmedetomidine .
